column6: company_profile

Marquard & Bahls, through its subsidiaries, wholesales, retails, and imports petroleum products in Europe and internationally. The company operates automatic service stations for commercial trucking fleets, such as heating oil, diesel, lubricants, bitumen, and pool stations, as well as service stations in Germany, Austria, Switzerland, and Moldova. The company was founded in 1947 and is based in Hamburg, Germany.
column37: Africa with key focus on east Africa

column6: Standard Bank Group, together with its subsidiaries, offers various banking and financial products to customers in South Africa and internationally. It operates in three segments: personal and business banking; corporate and investment banking; and wealth-liberty. The company was founded in 1862 and is based in Johannesburg, South Africa.

Novare Holdings is a privately owned asset management holding company. The firm provides investment management and investment consulting services through its wholly-owned subsidiaries. Novare Holdings was founded in 2000 and is based in Cape Town, South Africa with additional offices in Johannesburg, South Africa; Gaborone, Botswana; Port Louis, Mauritius; and Lagos, Nigeria.

Marquard & Bahls, through its subsidiaries, wholesales, retails, and imports petroleum products in Europe and internationally. The company was founded in 1947 and is based in Hamburg, Germany.
column37: Southern Mozambique and neighbouring countries including Swaziland, Zimbabwe, Botswana, and the northern provinces of South Africa.

column6: Godrej & Boyce is engaged in real estate, consumer goods, industrial engineering, appliances, furniture, security, and agricultural care businesses. The company offers products and services in these industries. It serves its customers in India and internationally. Godrej & Boyce was founded in 1897 and is based in Mumbai, India.
column27: Cosmetics, perfume, personal care & household products

column6: Banco Comercial Portugues (Millennium BCP) together with its subsidiaries, provides various banking and financial products and services. The company offers a range of financial products and services, including current accounts, payment systems, savings and investment products, and private banking services; and asset management and investment banking services, such as mortgage loans, consumer credit, commercial banking, leasing, factoring and insurance, and others, as well as personal, mortgage, and automobile loans. It was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Porto, Portugal.

Banco Comercial Portugues (Millennium BCP) together with its subsidiaries, provides various banking and financial products and services. The company offers a range of financial products and services, including current accounts, payment systems, savings and investment products, and private banking services; and asset management and investment banking services, such as mortgage loans, consumer credit, commercial banking, leasing, factoring and insurance, and others, as well as personal, mortgage, and automobile loans. It was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Porto, Portugal.
Heineken Holding supervises the management of the Heineken group. The company was established in 1952 and is based in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

Yara International, a chemical company, engages in the production, distribution, and sale of nitrogen-based mineral fertilisers and industrial products worldwide. The company supplies agricultural and industrial clients. The company produces ammonia, urea, nitrates, NPK fertiliser, and animal nutrition products. Yar also manufactures nitrate blends for use in the electronics industry, in addition to carbon dioxide and dry ice. The company was founded in 1905 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

Bayer makes prescription products and works in oncology, haematology, ophthalmology through its Pharmaceuticals division; OTC products like Claritin and Canesten via its Consumer Health division; and crop protection and pest control via its Crop Science division. Its top-selling pharmaceuticals include oral anticoagulant Xarelto and eye disease medicine Eylea. Also known as Bayer Group, the company has approximately 385 operating subsidiaries worldwide. The company was established in 1863 and is headquartered in Leverkusen, Germany.
column36: "With the promising economic trends pointing upwards, we believe that we are coming into Mozambique at the right time to make our contribution in the region." - Dr Klaus Eckstein, head (southern Africa), crop science.

column6: Standard Bank Group, together with its subsidiaries, offers various banking and financial products to customers in South Africa and internationally. It operates in three segments: personal and business banking; corporate and investment banking; and wealth-liberty. The company was founded in 1862 and is based in Johannesburg, South Africa.

Banco Comercial Portugues (Millennium BCP) together with its subsidiaries, provides various banking and financial products and services. The company offers a range of financial products and services, including current accounts, payment systems, savings and investment products, and private banking services; and asset management and investment banking services, such as mortgage loans, consumer credit, commercial banking, leasing, factoring and insurance, and others, as well as personal, mortgage, and automobile loans. It was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Porto, Portugal.

Anadarko Petroleum is engaged in the exploration, development, production, and marketing of oil and gas properties. It operates through three segments: Oil and Gas Exploration and Production; Midstream; and Marketing. The company explores for and produces natural gas, crude oil, condensate, and natural gas liquids (NGLs). It also operates and provides gathering, processing, treating, and transportation systems and services. In addition, the company sells oil, natural gas, anticipated liquefied natural gas, and NGLs of third-party purchased volumes. As of December 31, 2013, it had approximately 2.8 billion barrels of oil equivalent of proved reserves. The company was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in The Woodlands, Texas.

Eni SpA explores for and produces hydrocarbons in Italy, Africa, the North Sea, the Gulf of Mexico, Kazakhstan, and Australia. The company both produces natural gas and imports it for sale in Italy and elsewhere in Europe. Eni transports natural gas in pipelines. The company generates and trades electricity, refines oil, and operates gasoline service stations. Eni SpA was established in 1953 and is headquartered in Rome, Italy.

Rosneft Oil Company engages in the exploration, development, production, and sale of crude oil and gas, as well as refining, transportation, and sale of petroleum products. The company also offers various services, including field survey and exploration, gas processing, transportation, banking, electric-power transmission, and drilling services, as well as involved in the investment activities. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Moscow, Russia.

Tongaat Hulett is an agriculture and agri-processing business, focusing on the complementary feedstocks of sugarcane and maize. The company through its sugar and starch operations, produces a range of refined carbohydrate products from sugarcane and maize, with a number of products being interchangeable. Tongaat Hulett also holds a substantial land portfolio. It was founded in 1892 and is based in Tongatt, South Africa.

Obtala Resources, together with its subsidiaries, engages in agriculture, food production and timber projects. The company is also involved in processing and packaging fruits and vegetable; and the production of timber. The company was established in 2007 and is headquartered in London, UK.

Anhui Foreign Economic Construction primarily engages in the construction activities in China. It also holds franchise prospecting and mining licenses for diamond, gold, emerald, titanium-zirconium, copper, and other mineral resources in various African countries, such as Zimbabwe, Zambia, Mozambique, and the Democratic Republic of Congo, as well as engages in real estate development activities. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Hefei, China.

Eni SpA explores for and produces hydrocarbons in Italy, Africa, the North Sea, the Gulf of Mexico, Kazakhstan, and Australia. The company both produces natural gas and imports it for sale in Italy and elsewhere in Europe. Eni transports natural gas in pipelines. The company generates and trades electricity, refines oil, and operates gasoline service stations. Eni SpA was established in 1953 and is headquartered in Rome, Italy.

China Communications Construction Company, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the infrastructure construction and design, dredging, and heavy machinery manufacturing activities in China and internationally. The company undertakes various infrastructure construction projects, including ports, roads, bridges, railways, tunnels, and other projects. It is also involved in the infrastructure design of ports, roads, and bridges. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Beijing, China.

South Africa-based Shoprite operates as a consumer goods retailer. It engages in the retail sale of furniture, appliances, home entertainment products and floor coverings as well as food products. Shoprite was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in the Brackenfell area of Cape Town, South Africa.

Banco Comercial Portugues (Millennium BCP) together with its subsidiaries, provides various banking and financial products and services. The company offers a range of financial products and services, including current accounts, payment systems, savings and investment products, and private banking services; and asset management and investment banking services, such as mortgage loans, consumer credit, commercial banking, leasing, factoring and insurance, and others, as well as personal, mortgage, and automobile loans. It was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Porto, Portugal.

Airswift is an oil and gas recruitment agency. It provides contract, direct and executive placement services to oil and gas, and chemical industries. The company offers contract hire services, direct hire and executive search services. Airswift provides payroll and taxation, human resources and insurance, and travel and immigration services. The company was founded in January 2016 as the result of a merger between Air Energi Group and Swift Worldwide Resources.

The company offers contract hire services, direct hire and executive search services. Airswift provides payroll and taxation, human resources and insurance, and travel and immigration services. The company was founded in January 2016 as the result of a merger between Air Energi Group and Swift Worldwide Resources.
column36: Richard Clay, director, business development, Africa; "Mozambique's wealth of energy resources, particularly liquefied natural gas, make it an obvious strategic location for the company. This isn't about one immediate project but a long-term investment in an increasingly important area."

column6: China Jiang International Mozambique engages in construction and real estate projects in Mozambique. The company is headquartered in China.

Botswana-based Choppies, an investment holding company, owns and operates a chain of supermarkets in sub-Saharan Africa. The company operates value stores, superstores, and hyperstores under the Choppies brand name. Its stores offer products, including fruits and vegetables, bakery, butchery, takeaway, kiosk, bulk buys, frozen foods, cold drinks, dairy and general merchandise. In addition, the company distributes meat. Choppies was founded in 1986 and is based in Gaborone, Botswana.

The company offers contract hire services, direct hire and executive search services. Airswift provides payroll and taxation, human resources and insurance, and travel and immigration services. The company was founded in January 2016 as the result of a merger between Air Energi Group and Swift Worldwide Resources.

This isn't about one immediate project but a long-term investment in an increasingly important area."

column6: Tsogo Sun Holdings, through its subsidiaries, operates as a gaming, hotel and entertainment company. It operates Southern Sun branded hotels as well as approximately 14 casinos in South Africa. The company also owns, leases and manages approximately 94 hotels in Africa, the Middle East and the Seychelles. Tsogo Sun Holdings is based in Fourways, Johannesburg, South Africa.

Savannah Resources is a is a multi-commodity development company. The Company explores and develops projects for minerals in Mozambique. Savannah Resources also has two lithium projects in Finland. The company was established in 2010 and is headquartered in London, UK.
